oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forecasting Rhopalosiphum padi in Finland and experiences of POMO-project
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Markkula, Irmeli
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of one part of the POMO project is to study if it is possible to estimate the migration of insects beforehand by adding meteorological information to the decision making.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Markkula, Irmeli (2007) Forecasting Rhopalosiphum padi in Finland and experiences of POMO-project. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 3 (5), pp. 49-50.
